english.segment1: Alone, alone is where I'll be. Waiting, waiting so patiently. Escape this little war raging. One Still Small Voice. Come rescue me
english.segment2: Why wait, why wait. Why wait for You to Usher Me Down. Many o, many o, Lord, my God. The wonders that I have found. When You usher me down
english.segment3: Sacrifice and offering. You do not desire of me. I say here I am, You come. As if I ever had to call
english.segment4: Why wait, why wait. Why wait for You to Usher Me Down. Many o, many o, Lord, my God. The wonders that I have found. When You usher me down
english.segment5: Who could replace You?. None I know of. The Throne is Yours alone. Left to stand unshaken. Can't be taken back. Can't be taken back
english.segment6: Why wait, why wait. Why wait for You to Usher Me Down. Many o, many o, Lord, my God. The wonders that I have found. When You usher me down
